name: javascript-sdk
description: JavaScript SDKs for the Boring Metrics API
author: Aymeric Chauvin <contact@halftheopposite.dev>

scripts.build: yarn workspace @boringmetrics/core build && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/browser build && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/node build && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/react build
scripts.types:check: tsc --noEmit --project tsconfig.json && yarn workspaces run tsc --noEmit
scripts.clean: yarn workspace @boringmetrics/core clean && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/browser clean && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/node clean && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/react clean
scripts.publish:all: yarn build && yarn publish:core && yarn publish:browser && yarn publish:node && yarn publish:react
scripts.version:patch: yarn workspace @boringmetrics/core version patch && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/browser version patch && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/node version patch && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/react version patch
scripts.version:minor: yarn workspace @boringmetrics/core version minor && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/browser version minor && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/node version minor && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/react version minor
scripts.version:major: yarn workspace @boringmetrics/core version major && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/browser version major && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/node version major && yarn workspace @boringmetrics/react version major
